title: 1.7.2 forge 问题！
author: alan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 alan 于 2014-1-3 13:02 编辑 

[12:54:06 INFO]: Client> [12:54:06] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker

[12:54:07 INFO]: Client> [12:54:07] [main/INFO]: Found valid fingerprint for Minecraft Forge. Certificate fingerprint e3c3d50c7c986df74c645c0ac54639741c90a557
[12:54:07 INFO]: Client> [12:54:07] [main/ERROR]: The minecraft jar file:/Users/alanxu/Library/Application%20Support/minecraft/versions/1.7.2-Forge10.12.0.976/1.7.2-Forge10.12.0.976.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
[12:54:07 INFO]: Client> [12:54:07] [main/ERROR]: For your safety, FML will not launch minecraft. You will need to fetch a clean version of the minecraft jar file
[12:54:07 INFO]: Client> [12:54:07] [main/ERROR]: Technical information: The class net.minecraft.client.ClientBrandRetriever should have been associated with the minecraft jar file, and should have returned us a valid, intact minecraft jar location. This did not work. Either you have modified the minecraft jar file (if so run the forge installer again), or you are using a base editing jar that is changing this class (and likely others too). If you REALLY want to run minecraft in this configuration, add the flag -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true to the 'JVM settings' in your launcher profile.
[12:54:07 ERROR]: Game ended with bad state (exit code 1)

replies.author: 雪月霜落
replies.txt_content:

172貌似问题蛮多的。所以，MOD也不多的样子=。=
